About

Foundnforgotten was created as a result of seeing too much pollution around Taiwan’s coastline. I hope that by viewing discarded rubbish in a lost and found setting, people will start to regard it not as part of the view, but as rubbish. Please, next time you take a trip to the coast, hook a brother up and pick up some rubbish!

Foundnforgotten 做出來的原因是為了讓人民知道在台灣的海邊到處都有垃圾.我希望看到這個網站後可以改變觀眾的概念.請各位下一次下去海邊幫忙拿一點垃圾帶回家去丟吧!
